summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image shows a scene from a video game set in a snowy environment. A character, dressed in fur clothing and holding a spear, stands on a snow-covered rocky terrain, facing a frozen river. Across the river, there are two humanoid creatures on a rocky area, and a wooden structure is visible in the background. A red dashed circle highlights a glowing object on the ground, suggesting it is an item of interest. The game's interface displays various icons and a health bar at the bottom left corner, while the text "Gentian x1" appears on the right side, indicating the acquisition of an item named Gentian.
